name: s3calendar
title: S3-Calendar
description: This addons for Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome provide a way to export events from Uniba-Esse3 to Google Calendar
author: PV Solution - Copyright 2014

preferences.name: calendarName
preferences.title: Goolge Calendar ID
preferences.description: TIPS: Go to google.com/calendar, on the left click on 'My Calendar' then click 'Settings'. In the new opened page click on prefered calendar and at Calendar Adress's row copy the calendar ID string.
